global.balanceErrorMessage: Jums nav pietiekami IOTA lai pabeigtu šo pārskaitījumu.
global.transferErrorMessage: Kaut kas nogāja greizi, sūtot jūsu pārskaitījumu. Lūdzu, mēģiniet vēlreiz.
global.transferSentMessage: Jūsu pārskaitījums ticis nosūtīts uz Tangle tīklu.
global.messageSentMessage: Jūsu ziņojums ticis nosūtīts uz Tangle tīklu.
global.keyReuseError: You cannot send to an address that has already been spent from.
global.invalidResponseExplanation: The node returned an error. Try changing node.
global.invalidResponseFetchingAccount: The node returned an error while fetching your account information. Try changing node.
global.nodeOutOfSyncExplanation: Your currently selected node is out of sync. Please change node or try again.
global.thisNodeOutOfSync: This node is out of sync. Please change node or try again.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: The password was not recognised. Please try again.
global.emptyPasswordExplanation: You must enter a password. Please try again.
global.syncInProgressExplanation: Please wait until syncing is complete.
global.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Go to advanced settings to reset the wallet.
global.attachToTangleUnavailable: Remote Proof of Work is unavailable
global.attachToTangleUnavailableExplanation: Remote Proof of Work is not available on your selected node. Either change node or set Proof of Work to Local in Advanced Settings.
global.attachToTangleUnavailableExplanationShor: Remote Proof of Work is not available on your selected node.
global.pressBackAgain: Press back again to close the app
global.autopromotionErrorExplanation: Remote Proof of Work is not available on your selected node. Please change node and reenable auto-promotion.
global.promotionErrorExplanation: Something went wrong while promoting your transaction. Please try again.
global.noLongerValid: The bundle you are trying to promote is no longer valid
global.transactionAlreadyConfirmedExplanation: The transaction you are trying to promote is already confirmed.
global.cannotSendToOwnExplanation: You cannot send to an address that is being used as an input in the transaction.
global.pleaseWaitExplanation: Trinity is performing another function. Please wait and try again.
global.pleaseWaitTransferExplanation: Your available balance is currently being used in other transfers. Please wait for one to confirm before trying again.
global.pleaseWaitIncomingTransferExplanation: You have incoming transfers. Please wait for them to confirm before trying again.
global.snapshotTransitionInProgressExplanation: Please wait until the transition is complete.
global.nodeMustUseHTTPSExplanation: Only custom nodes using HTTPS are allowed.
global.nodeDuplicatedExplanation: The custom node is already listed.
global.nodeAutoChangedExplanation: Switched to new node {{- nodeAddress}} as selected node is offline.
global.fingerprintOnSend: Touch fingerprint reader to authorise the transfer
global.masterKey: Your IOTA seed is the master key to your funds.
global.seedThief: If someone else has your seed they can steal your IOTA.
global.couldNotVerifyDeviceIntegrity: Could not verify device integrity because Google Play Services are not available.
global.noNetworkConnectionExplanation: Your internet connection appears to be offline.
global.discordInformation: Sending from the same address more than once is dangerous. Please head to the #help channel on Discord to find out what you can do.
global.androidInsecureClipboardWarning: Android does not provide a secure clipboard.
global.androidCopyPasteWarning: Never copy/paste your seed on an Android device.
global.willNotCopyPasteSeed: I will not copy/paste my seed
global.deviceMayBecomeUnresponsive: Your device may become unresponsive for a while.
global.ifYourBalanceIsNotCorrect: If your balance is not correct, it is likely that you are using a pre-snapshot seed.
global.headToAdvancedSettingsForTransition: Head to Advanced Settings and perform a Snapshot Transition.
global.signedTrytesBroadcastErrorExplanation: There was a network error while broadcasting your transaction.
global.addressesAlreadySpentFrom: One or more of the addresses have already been spent from.
global.problemSendingYourTransaction: There was a problem sending your transaction.
global.problemPerformingProofOfWork: There was a problem performing proof of work.
global.tryingAgainWithLocalPoW: Trying again with local Proof of Work.
global.tryingAgainWithDifferentNode: Trying again with a different node.
global.errorAccessingKeychainExplanation: Cannot access keychain required for secure storage.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Please use a unique account name for your seed.
addAdditionalSeed.accountNameTooLongExplanation: Account name maximum length is {{maxLength}} characters.
addAdditionalSeed.noNicknameExplanation: Please enter an account name for your seed.
addAdditionalSeed.seedInUseExplanation: This seed is already linked to your wallet. Please use a different one.

changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Your password has been successfully updated.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Your current password is incorrect. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least 11 characters. Please try again.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: You cannot use the old password as your new password. Please try again with a new password.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Ensure you use a strong password of at least 11 characters.
changePassword.passwordTooWeakReason: Your password is too weak. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
changePassword.reasonRow: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonPattern: Short patterns of keys are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonNames: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonRepeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonRepeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are only slightly harder to guess than 'abc'.
changePassword.reasonSequence: Sequences like abc or 54321 are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonYears: Recent years are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonDates: Dates are often easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonTop10: This is a top 10 common password.
changePassword.reasonTop100: This is a top 100 common password.
changePassword.reasonCommon: This is a very common password.
changePassword.reasonSimilar: This is similar to a commonly-used password.
changePassword.reasonWord: A single word is easy to guess.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least {{minLength}} characters. It is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: The passwords you have entered do not match. Please try again.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored on your device. You will use this password to access your wallet in future.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seeds should be {{maxLength}} characters long, and should contain capital letters A-Z, or the number 9. You cannot use seeds longer than {{maxLength}} characters.
enterSeed.neverShare: NEVER SHARE YOUR SEED WITH ANYONE

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: You must enter a password to log in. Please try again.
login.whyBiometricDisabledExplanation: Biometric login is disabled on first app load for your security. When using Trinity, you will be logged out for inactivity. You can then log back in with biometric authentication.

loading.loadingFirstTime: Loading seed for the first time.
loading.doNotMinimise: Do not minimise or close the app.
loading.takingAWhile: This seems to be taking a while

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: Please click the Generate New Seed button.
newSeedSetup.individualLetters: Press individual letters to randomise them.
newSeedSetup.individualLetterCount: Press <1><0>{{count}}</0></1> more letter to randomise it.
newSeedSetup.individualLetterCount_plural: Press <1><0>{{count}}</0></1> more letters to randomise them.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: The wallet is now set up and ready to use. If you need to make any changes in the future, look in the Settings menu.

paperWallet.neverShare: Never share your seed with anyone.
paperWallet.paperConvenience: Printing a paper copy of your seed is a convenient way to store it.
paperWallet.publicInsecure: But printing on public wifi or a public printer is insecure.
paperWallet.tapCheckboxes: Please tap the checkboxes below to confirm.
paperWallet.wifiCheckbox: I will not print on public wifi
paperWallet.printerCheckbox: I will not print on a public printer

receive.addressCopiedExplanation: Your address has been copied to the clipboard.
receive.missingPermissionExplanation: Access to the file system is required in order to share QR codes.

saveYourSeed.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.
saveYourSeed.youCanHighlightCharacters: You can highlight 9 characters at a time
saveYourSeed.whatIsChecksum: Every seed has a corresponding 3-character checksum
saveYourSeed.checksumExplanation: Whenever you add a seed to your wallet, you should ensure that the wallet-generated checksum matches the one you have written down.
saveYourSeed.mustSaveYourSeed: <0><0>You must save your seed with </0><1>at least one</1><2> of the options listed below.</2></0>

seedReentry.trinityWillNeverAskToReenter: Trinity will never ask you to re-enter this seed unless you reset your wallet or the app.
seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: The seed you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back and do so.
seedReentry.enterSeedBelow: Enter your newly created seed below to confirm you have backed it up correctly
seedReentry.clipboardWarning: Do not copy paste your seed
seedReentry.clipboardWarningExplanation: WARNING: Copy paste is disabled for your security.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be {{maxLength}} characters long and should have a checksum.
send.invalidAddressExplanationGeneric: Valid addresses should be 90 characters and contain only A-Z or 9.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: Jums nav pietiekami IOTA lai pabeigtu šo pārskaitījumu.
send.invalidMessageTooLongExplanation: The message exceeds the max. amount of characters (1093).
send.invalidAmountExplanation: Please enter a valid transaction amount. It may be helpful to view the IOTA unit explanation at the bottom of this page.
send.addressPasteExplanation: It looks like you have pasted an address. Make sure that the address matches the one you want to send to.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: You can use multiple seeds with this wallet. Each seed requires an account name.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: You can add more seeds in the Settings menu.

modeSelection.advancedModeExplanation: Advanced mode will display more detailed technical information.
modeSelection.modesExplanation: Only enable Advanced mode if you are experienced using IOTA. You may find it confusing otherwise.

settings.transferSendingExplanation: Please wait until your transfer has been sent.
settings.nicknameChangedExplanation: Your account name has been changed.
settings.accountDeletedExplanation: Your account has been removed from the wallet.
settings.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Go to advanced settings to reset the wallet.
settings.couldNotFetchRatesExplanation: Something went wrong while fetching conversion rate for {{currency}}.
settings.fetchedConversionRatesExplanation: Successfully fetched latest conversion rate for {{currency}}.
settings.autoNodeSwitching: Automatically switch node when selected is unreachable
settings.nodeChangeSuccessNoRemotePow: The node was changed to {{node}}. This node does not support remote Proof of Work.
settings.nodeChangeErrorExplanation: There was an error changing node. Please try again.

resetWalletRequirePassword.enterPassword: Enter your password to reset the wallet.

walletSetup.okay: Okay. Let's set up your wallet!
walletSetup.doYouNeedASeed: Do you need to create a new seed?
walletSetup.seedExplanation: Your IOTA seed is the master key to your funds. It is 81 characters long, using only letters A-Z or the number 9.
walletSetup.explanation: <0><0>You can use it to access your funds from</0><1> any wallet</1><2>, on</2><3> any device.</3></0>
walletSetup.loseSeed: But if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA.

welcome.thankYou: Thank you for downloading the IOTA wallet

writeSeedDown.writeDownYourSeed: <0> Write down your seed and checksum and </0><1>triple check</1><2> that they are correct.</2>

history.bundleHashCopiedExplanation: The bundle hash has been copied to the clipboard.
history.addressCopiedExplanation: The address has been copied to the clipboard.
history.messageCopiedExplanation: The message has been copied to the clipboard.

addCustomNode.customNodeCouldNotBeAdded: Custom node could not be added
addCustomNode.invalidNodeResponse: The node returned an invalid response

advancedSettings.autoPromotionExplanation: Auto-promotion helps to confirm your transactions on the Tangle. Enable this setting if you are having difficulty getting your transactions to confirm.
advancedSettings.autoPromotionPoW: Auto-promotion is only possible on nodes that support remote Proof of Work.

logoutConfirmationModal.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

usedAddressModal.cantSpendFullBalanceQuestion: Why can't I spend my full balance?
usedAddressModal.spentAddressExplanation: You have funds on one or more spent addresses. Address reuse is dangerous in IOTA, so this wallet does not allow you to send from the same address more than once.
usedAddressModal.discordInformation: Please head to the #help channel on Discord to find out what you can do.

deleteAccount.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.yourSeedWillBeRemoved: Your seed and transaction history will be removed.
deleteAccount.enterPassword: Enter your password to delete this account.

manualSync.outOfSync: Does your transaction history look like it may be out of sync?
manualSync.pressToSync: Press the button below to sync your account.
manualSync.doNotClose: Please note, minimising the app will cancel the sync.

useExistingSeed.title: Enter a seed and account name.
useExistingSeed.validSeedExplanation: Valid seeds should be 81 characters and contain only A-Z or 9.

viewSeed.enterPassword: Enter password to view your seed.

saveSeedConfirmation.didSaveSeed: Did you back up your seed?
saveSeedConfirmation.reenterSeed: At the next step you will be asked to re-enter your seed.
saveSeedConfirmation.reenterSeedWarning: If you have not backed up your seed and your device fails, you will lose all of your IOTA.
saveSeedConfirmation.pleaseConfirm: Please confirm you have securely stored your seed.

walletResetConfirmation.warning: <0><0>All of your wallet data including your </0><1>seeds, password,</1><2> and </2><3>other account information</3><4> will be lost.</4></0>

fingerprintSetup.instructionsEnable: Touch fingerprint reader to enable fingerprint authentication
fingerprintSetup.instructionsDisable: Touch fingerprint reader to disable fingerprint authentication
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthEnabledExplanation: You have successfully enabled biometric authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthDisabledExplanation: You have successfully disabled biometric authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthFailedExplanation: Fingerprint authentication failed. Please try again.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintUnavailableExplanation: Your device does not support biometric authentication or it has not been configured in the device settings.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsDisable: Press the button below to disable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsEnable: Press the button below to enable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsDisableIPhoneX: Press the button below to disable Face ID.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsEnableIPhoneX: Press the button below to enable Face ID.
fingerprintSetup.instructionsLogin: Touch fingerprint reader to log in

transferConfirmation.youAreAbout: You are about to send {{contents}} to the address

twoFA.wrongCodeExplanation: The code you entered is incorrect.
twoFA.emptyCodeExplanation: Please enter a code and try again.
twoFA.keyCopiedExplanation: Your 2FA key has been copied to the clipboard.
twoFA.addKey: Add this key to your 2FA app
twoFA.twoFAEnabledExplanation: You have successfully enabled Two Factor Authentication.
twoFA.twoFADisabledExplanation: You have successfully disabled Two Factor Authentication.
twoFA.enterCode: Enter the code from your 2FA app

seedVault.seedVaultExplanation: A SeedVault is an encrypted file for storing your seed securely. The seed is encrypted behind a password and cannot be accessed without that password.
seedVault.seedVaultWarning: Make sure you back up the file in multiple locations (e.g. hard drive, cloud, USB). If you lose this file and have not stored your seed elsewhere, you will lose your IOTA.
seedVault.exportFailExplanation: There was an problem exporting the SeedVault. Please ensure you have the appropriate permissions and enough free space.
seedVault.exportSuccessExplanation: Your encrypted seed file was exported successfully.
seedVault.dropSeedVaultHere: Drop SeedVault here <1></1> or click to browse
seedVault.enterPasswordExplanation: Enter your password to open the SeedVault
seedVault.noSeedFound: SeedVault does not contain a valid seed
seedVault.noSeedFoundExplanation: The SeedVault is either empty or contains a seed in an invalid format.
seedVault.seedFileErrorExplanation: There was a problem opening the SeedVault. If you selected the correct file then it may be corrupted.
seedVault.seedVaultPasswordExplanation: First we need to secure your SeedVault. Please choose a password to encrypt the file. You will need this password to restore your seed from the SeedVault back up. Feel free to use the same password you use for Trinity.

rootDetection.appearsRooted: Your device appears to be rooted.
rootDetection.securityRisk: This can pose a significant risk to the security of your wallet.
rootDetection.continueDepsiteRisk: Do you wish to continue despite this risk?

pow.feeless: It is necessary to complete a little proof of work to send feeless transactions in IOTA.
pow.localOrRemote: Proof of work can either be completed locally on your device, or offloaded to a node.
pow.powUpdatedExplanation: Your proof of work configuration has been updated.

autoPromotion.autoPromotionUpdatedExplanation: Your auto-promotion configuration has been updated.

snapshotTransition.cannotCompleteTransitionExplanation: Your balance must be greater than 0 to complete the transition.
snapshotTransition.transitionCompleteExplanation: The snapshot transition has completed successfully.
snapshotTransition.snapshotExplanation: Every so often, a snapshot is performed to prune the size of the Tangle.
snapshotTransition.hasSnapshotTakenPlace: Has a snapshot taken place? Press the button below to transition.

updates.noUpdatesAvailableExplanation: You have the latest version of Trinity Desktop.
updates.newVersionAvailableExplanation: A new Trinity {{version}} version is available. Carefully read the release notes and verify the download source before updating:
updates.installUpdateExplanation: Download complete, Trinity will now restart to install the update.

tray.trayExplanation: Provides an overview of your account balances and recent transaction history.

notifications.notificationExplanation: Receive system-wide notifications about new transactions.
notifications.typeMessages: Notify me about zero value transactions

bytetrit.sweepSucceededExplanation: Your funds have been successfully unlocked and moved to a new address. Promote the transactions to help them confirm.
bytetrit.sweepErrorExplanation: Something went wrong while unlocking your funds. Trying again.
bytetrit.explanation: Trinity Desktop version 0.3.4 contained a bug that can temporarily lock funds. This affects a small number of users that performed transactions with 0.3.4.
bytetrit.explanationAccounts: Locked funds have been detected on your accounts: {{accounts}}. Trinity will now automatically recover your funds, by moving them to a new address.
bytetrit.sweepConfirmation: You are about to sweep {{amount}} to the address {{address}}. Account: {{accountName}}, address index: {{index}}
